title: Surrounded: peer group membership
brief_description: Looks at the situation of two members of an adolescent group who each for different reasons does not wish to attend a weekend holiday with the others. Shows how they handle the pressure exerted on them by the other members of the group to conform. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
